name: actions.do
description: SDK for performing tasks within workflows
author: Drivly

scripts.build: pnpm prepare && pnpm generate:types && tsup --config tsup.config.ts
scripts.prepare:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');['generated','src'].forEach(dir=>!fs.existsSync(dir)&&fs.mkdirSync(dir));fs.writeFileSync('generated/types.ts','export interface ComposioActionTypes {}
export const COMPOSIO_ACTIONS = [] as const
export type ComposioActionName = typeof COMPOSIO_ACTIONS[number]
');fs.writeFileSync('src/constants.ts','export const ACTION_NAMES = [] as const
export type ActionName = (typeof ACTION_NAMES)[number]
');"
scripts.generate:types: tsx ../../scripts/generateComposioTypes.ts || echo 'Failed to generate types, using placeholders'
